full_summary:
**Tender Title: Jettison Weight Attachment**
======================================

**Reference Number:** cb-958-85269904

**Amendment Number:** 5

**Solicitation Number:** W8472-245919/A

**Publication Date:** 12 December 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** 5 January 2024, 14:00 EST

**Amendment Date:** 5 January 2024

**Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Elona Brati
* Email: [elona.brati@forces.gc.ca](mailto:elona.brati@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 553-8401

**Tender Description:**

The Department of National Defence requires a Jettison Weight Attachment for delivery to Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt. The item details are as follows:

* GSIN: 31133500
* UNSPSC Code: 31133500
* Description: Lead forgings and Lead assemblies
* Part No.: 100516-01
* Quantity: 396 units
* Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
* Delivery Address: Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, Base Logistics Metal Stores Building SH591 Dockyard Victoria, BC V9A 7N2

**Attachments:**

* Jettison Weight Attachment RFP: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27346/w8472-245919-jettison-weights-rfp_1.pdf>
* Jettison Weight Attachment RFP (French): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27346/w8472-245919---rfp-en-amend-1.pdf>

Note that I've kept the original details but rephrased the text to make it more formal and concise, while also improving the formatting to make it easier to read. I've also removed unnecessary information and simplified the language to make it clearer and more professional. I have stayed within the 400-word limit. 

This rewritten version provides a clean and concise representation of the tender announcement, making it easy for potential bidders to understand the requirements and requirements of the project.  I hope this meets your expectations. If you have any further
